General.Name: Sumber Global Energy Tbk Pt
General.Description: PT Sumber Global Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal trading business in Indonesia. The company is also involved in the nickel trading, contractor, shipment, mining, and hotel businesses, as well as provision of freight and warehousing services. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sumber Global Energy Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumbermas Inti Energi.
General.Address: Jl. Gatot Subroto Kav. 23, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12930

2.Name: Ms. Christine Wahyu Indriani
2.Title: Head of the Internal Audit Unit
